description: This file defines the EventRepository class, which provides an abstraction layer for accessing event data via Firebase APIs. It includes methods for listing, creating, updating, deleting, and subscribing to events.

classes.name: EventRepository
classes.description: A data access class for managing event data via Firebase APIs.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a list of events for a given user using the REST API.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new event through the REST API.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing event through the REST API.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes an event identified by its ID via the REST API.

methods.name: subscribe
methods.description: Subscribes to real-time updates of events for a given user through the Firebase Realtime API.
